price: And [remember] when We gave Moses the Scripture and the criterion[30], so that you may be guided.
arabic: وَإِذۡ ءَاتَيۡنَا مُوسَى ٱلۡكِتَٰبَ وَٱلۡفُرۡقَانَ لَعَلَّكُمۡ تَهۡتَدُونَ
footnotes: [30] Differentiating between truth and falsehood. "The Scripture and the criterion" refers to the Torah.
